context.name: Tippmann Arms Ambi Safety Selector
context.excerpt: The Tippmann Arms M4-22 Ambidextrous Selector Switch is constructed from durable steel and features a standard 90-degree throw.
context.content:
The Tippmann Arms M4-22 Ambidextrous Selector Switch is constructed from durable steel and features a standard 90-degree throw.

This selector will only fit the Tippmann Arms M4-22 rifles and pistols.

 

Tippmann Arms Ambi Safety Selector Features:

Easy Installation
Right & Left Levers
